description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Overcoming Age Bias in Career Changes.

hook.text: He was 48 and wanted to switch to tech. Everyone said he was too old. They were wrong.

buildup.text: Age bias is real in hiring. But research shows older career changers bring unique advantages.

twist.text: The average age of successful startup founders is 45, not 25. Experience is an asset, not a liability.

punchline.text: You're not too old to change. You're experienced enough to change wisely.
